composite.name: Object
composite.description: Variable length data, also know as octect string

validValue.name: None
validValue.description: No application messages should be sent in one direction of a session

validValue.name: Credentials
validValue.description: Failed authentication because identity is not recognized, or the user is not authorized to use a particular service

validValue.name: FlowTypeNotSupported
validValue.description: Server does not support requested client flow type

validValue.name: Unnegotiated
validValue.description: Establish request was not preceded by a Negotiation or session was finalized, requiring renegotiation

validValue.name: AlreadyEstablished
validValue.description: EstablishmentAck was already sent; Establish was redundant

validValue.name: KeepaliveInterval
validValue.description: Value is out of accepted range

validValue.name: Credentials
validValue.description: Failed authentication because identity is not recognized, or the user is not authorized to use a particular service

validValue.name: OutOfRange
validValue.description: NextSeqNo + Count is beyond the range of sequence numbers

validValue.name: InvalidSession
validValue.description: The specified SessionId is unknown or is not authorized for the requester to access

validValue.name: RequestLimitExceeded
validValue.description: The message Count exceeds a local rule for maximum retransmission size

composite.name: messageHeader
composite.description: Message identifiers and length of message root

field.name: Timestamp
field.description: Timestamp used as a unique identifier of the request

data.name: Classification
data.description: Category of application messages that follow

field.name: NextSeqNo
field.description: For re-establishment of a recoverable flow only, the next application sequence number to be produced by the client

field.name: NextSeqNo
field.description: For a recoverable flow only, the next application sequence number to be produced by the server

field.name: FromSeqNo
field.description: Sequence number of the first message requested

field.name: Count
field.description: Count of messages to be retransmitted in a batch

field.name: LastSeqNo
field.description: Must be populated for an idempotent or recoverable flow

sbe:message.name: Applied
sbe:message.description: An application message; consumes a sequence number

field.name: Count
field.description: How many messages have been applied

sbe:message.name: NotApplied
sbe:message.description: An application message; consumes a sequence number

field.name: FromSeqNo
field.description: The first not applied sequence number

field.name: Count
field.description: How many messages haven't been applied

field.name: EffectiveTime
field.description: Date-time that the template becomes effective. If not present, effective immediately.

data.name: Template
data.description: Content of the template or message schema
